explanation: The stage direction provides a narrative description of events, including the actions of characters and their reactions. It outlines how the old man translates for the natives, as well as the natives' astonishment and indignation. This fits the definition of narration, as it recounts a sequence of actions and experiences rather than just describing character movements or interactions distinctly.
stgdir: Le vieillard sert de truchement aux sauvages, devant lesquels passent en revue les rois. Il leur traduit dans le langage des signes, ce qui se dit à mesure que les rois paraissent sur la scène. Les sauvages donnent tour à tour des marques d'étonnement et d'indignation.
